author: Alex Woodward, Alex Woodward
title: Coronavirus: Californians flock to Joshua Tree despite order to stay at home while sunbathers fill closed Hawaii beaches
description: Frustrated officials sound alarm to stay indoors as spring weather lures Americans outdoors
content:
Massive crowds continued to fill parks and beaches across the US despite statewide stay-at-home orders and repeated warnings from officials to prevent the spread of coronavirus by avoiding group contact 
Joshua Tree National Park in California closed the spr… [+2634 chars]
